title: Drawing Application UI Verification
goal: Verify the presence and functionality of the drawing canvas, pencil tool, color selector, and save feature.

steps.expected: The application window appears with a central drawing area, a toolbar at the top or side, and a color selection widget.

steps.action: Click the 'Pencil' button in the toolbar
steps.expected: The Pencil button visually indicates it is selected (e.g., pressed state).

steps.action: Select a bright red color from the color selector
steps.expected: The active drawing color is updated to red.

steps.action: Perform a click-and-drag motion on the canvas
steps.expected: A red line is rendered on the canvas following the mouse path.

steps.action: Click the 'Save' button in the toolbar
steps.expected: A file dialog or a confirmation message appears indicating the drawing has been saved.
